name: LD50 - The Last Line
description:
This was a submission for Ludum Dare 50 Compo.

Mouse Wheel to control the player by default.

More can be found on https://github.com/crbac3217/LD50AskingForIt

Pipelines are https://github.com/crbac3217/LD50_3Dto2D

*spoliers(?)*

Since the theme was "Delay the inevitable", it was pretty obvious that a lot of the games would revolve around the theme of "time", and "death". I wanted to move away from such topics, so I re-interpreted the theme of "the inevitable" as "bound to happen". Then I mixed it with the opposite of death: making a game that is bound to make "life" happen.

**Also, if you can't beat the game, try using a birthcontrol.
